text: Buru Tetaren Sanla22.1 Buru Tetaren Sanla: Yahudiyane yi burun donma xii solofere lɛbɛn mi saxi naxan yi sanli ito yi. E sariɲan kiina nde nan yi a ra. A mato Xɔrɔyaan 12.15 kui. yi maso naxan xili Halagi Tiin Dangu Lɔxɔn Sanla.22.1 Halagi Tiin Dangu Lɔxɔn Sanla: Musaa waxatini, Ala fitina feen nafa nɛn Firawona yamaan ma, malekan yi fa e dii singene birin faxa kɔɛ kedenna ra. Koni, Isirayila kaane yi saraxa wunla xuya e banxine dɛ wudine ma, saya malekan yi dangu e xun ma. Na feen sanla ni ito ra. A mato Xɔrɔyaan 12.1-13 kui.
